title: Five Key Narratives to Watch For at COP28
description:
The annual United Nations climate negotiations are just a week away. Known as COP28 — since it’s the 28th year of the “conference of the parties” to the United Nations climate agreement — it will be hosted by the United Arab Emirates in Dubai from November 30 through December 12.  COP28 will be especially significant, […]

The post Five Key Narratives to Watch For at COP28 appeared first on DeSmog.

title: Report: Oil and Gas Production Set to Escalate Under Landmark U.S. Climate Law
description:
A new report warns that oil and gas production in the United States is expected to rise under Biden’s signature climate law, the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA), and shows how the policy will not be enough for the U.S. to meet its 2030 climate target.   

The post Report: Oil and Gas Production Set to Escalate Under Landmark U.S. Climate Law  appeared first on DeSmog.

title: UK Advertising Watchdog Bans Toyota SUV Ads on Environmental Grounds
description:
The UK advertising watchdog has banned two adverts for Toyota SUVs, ruling that images of cars racing over plains and through rivers condoned a style of off-road driving that “disregarded” the impact on nature.  Climate advocates calling for tighter rules on advertising of heavily polluting products welcomed the Advertising Standards Authority’s (ASA) move — the […]

The post UK Advertising Watchdog Bans Toyota SUV Ads on Environmental Grounds appeared first on DeSmog.
